com.anthavio.util
Class RcGenerator

java.lang.Object
  com.anthavio.util.RcGenerator

public class RcGenerator
extends Object

Random generator of valid Czech 'Rodne cislo' numbers. Produces numbers in formats 123456/1234 and 123456/123 for numbers older than year 1954.

Version:
$Revision: 5142 $
Author:
Pavel Muller
See Also:
RcGenerator.RcType
